name: Dawn of H'btakh (itch)
description:
Surreal roguelike arcade FPS!

The fish demon H'btakh is trapped in a maze, luckily he has lots of super powers!

Sneeze your way through 5 different flavours of procedurally generated madness!

System Requirements :

Windows 7 or above

Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster

DirectX 11 compatible graphics card

8GB RAM

Warning: tobacco reference and blood splatters
